MarkerCategory.name: stack
MarkerCategory.info: Hit F to make the mark disappear.

POI.info: Slowly open the coffins and kill enemies until the gate guard appears.
Interacting with chains will disable traps. Chain on the left is bugged.
Goal in the next room is to grab a rock and the place it on a pressure plate marked with the arrow.
Drop the rock here.
Kill the ghosts and Lieutenant. Afterwards, go West then East to clear the bosses then return here to fight the last boss.
Walk on the beam to get to the pillar. If dps is low, the boss will teleport and summon pet. After killing the boss, go back to the main room and head East.
Boss inflicts condi and can heal off of her minions.

Keep the bosses separated by using the rocks to knock them down. If they are together, Vassar gets reflects and Ralena knocks people back. Bring some condi cleanse for Ralena. After killing the last boss, you should be able to return to the center for the last fight. Use Murals Waypoint to get there faster.
After killing all the champions, face the final boss. Attack King Adelbern in melee range to avoid his more annoying attacks.
Interact with NPCs with the red marker over their head until the bar fills.
Use the button.
Dump water bucket on Sigfast to wake him up.
Kill enemies then open the cage.
Most of the Nightmare pods can be ignored. Open them one at a time to avoid multiple enemies from overwhelming the group.
Boss has knockdown combo which can pin you down.
Regrow the bridge by collecting items marked in red on the map. One of the items is found after killing a boss underwater.
Once all the item objectives are found talk to the NPC to regrow the bridge.
Boss summons exploding spiders which leave poison aoe. Boss occasionally fears people.
If you get transformed into a kitten, kill a nightmare pup to turn back.
Open pods with icons over them. Kill the enemy and toss the essence at the Husk.

If your team can't cleave them all down, you can focus and pick a person off. Slap Faolain hard when she attempts to revive them. Eir is ranged and can be projectile reflected. Rytlock and Logan can be picked off with ranged. Zojja's orb attack can be easily sidestepped.
If the group struggles, slowly pick off the enemies, then fight the golem and the boss, so you don't get overwhelmed.
Punishes melee with aoe attack. Golem spin reflects projectile attacks.
Go left and avoid the adds and crushers to grab gears from the panel bring them down and place them into the panel by the door to open it.
Run past the turrets and enemies and drop down and enter the tunnel.
Bring condi cleanse. Boss runs off every 25% and summons a different golem. Fire golem will heal with conditions.

Ranged attacks and condi clear is recommended. Hide behind the shield to avoid the eye laser and burning damage. Kill elemental and toss boulders at the boss. When he yanks the chains, he'll pour lava into the area with the shields.
As long as the group moves fast, unimportant enemies will spawn behind you and can be ignored or won't spawn at all.
Rozgar has two adds that are undamageable and mimics his skills. 100-75% high dmg whirl attack. 75-50% hammer knockdowns. 50-25% Axe. 25% life steal daggers. Afterwards, destroy the Brazier.
Clear out enemies before fighting the boss. Bolok summons a flamewall that can be easily stepped out of but does a lot of damage. Every 25% he summons two enemies.
Boss summons imps which get close and explode.
Effigy will burn nearby players. Kill the acolytes when the shields drop to stop them from healing the effigy.

Wait for the boulders to hit the shield, pick up the Molten Heart and toss it at the boss. Avoid the fireball AOEs or get knocked back. Attack him when he's a normal Charr. Break the walls when they form to get past them.
Enemies respawn infinitely until the ice shard destroyed.
Boss has high damage aoe chill. Occasional knockbacks in melee range.
Reflects projectiles. Transforms at 40% and hits harder.
Light the braziers near the door by interacting with them. The elementals infinitely respawn with the wall up. Avoid the ice trails before they explode.
Pull boss away from turrets, adds will spawn infinitely while the boss is alive, avoid the ice spray.
Kill the pet first: will eat you and spit you out and aoe poison. Hunter hits hard but has long windup/jump animation. Break line of sight to stop bird attack. Boon rip/corruption helps the fight.
Skip Path: If your group is ok with it, you can blink past the portal and run to the end boss.
Skip Path: Land on the ledge here to get back your land skills and blink up.
Skip Path: Blink here from underwater to skip to the boss.

Skip Path: To trigger the last boss, you must run into the other room and be on the other side of the door to fight Honor's Voice then you can fight Kodan's Bane like normal. If you are trapped in this room after triggering the cutsceen and can't fight Honor's Voice, you have to reset the dungeon.
Focus the alarm. Enemies infinitely respawn unless the alarm is destroyed.
Golems have knockbacks and stuns. Enemies sometimes gain projectile reflect.
Rush in before the Charr is dead so they are distracted. Enemies channel a long stun.
If you kill the consoles quickly, they won't transform.
Enemies activate in waves. Refrain from killing the last one if your group needs time to recover.
Protect Zojja from powerful enemies. If the group struggles consider stealthing her or having a dedicated healer while the rest distracts and kills the enemies.
Take the guns and walk under the shield of the robot. Use the gun on the sparks to kill them.
Power Suit hits hard and can stun. Regular Kudu can teleport and has a oneshot attack. Monster has a powerful AOE ground punch, can crystallize stun you, summon grubs and tendrils.
